title: Synthetic identity attacks and account takeover attacks see the highest growth in the BFSI sector
description: A research report by Experian highlights a significant rise in synthetic identity attacks and account takeover attacks within the Financial sector. The report indicates that 67% of respondents are struggling to keep up with the evolving fraud landscape. To combat these threats effectively, the report recommends implementing multiple layered defenses.
